title: STAT+: Startup Altido Therapeutics pursues CAR-T for glioblastoma tumors
description: Glioblastoma is almost always fatal. Altido Bio is trying to commercialize a CAR-T cell therapy that has shown rare promise.
content: Glioblastoma is almost always fatal. Altido Bio is trying to commercialize a CAR-T cell therapy that has shown rare promise.
